title: Terry McAuliffe
summary: Terence Richard McAuliffe (born February 9, 1957) is an American businessman and politician who served as the 72nd governor of Virginia from 2014 to 2018.[1] A member of the Democratic Party, he was co-chairman of President Bill Clinton's 1996 re-election campaign,[2] chairman of the  Democratic National Committee from 2001 to 2005, and chairman of Hillary Clinton's 2008 presidential campaign.
